headline: Ask HN: Any DNS providers with anti-DDoS protection not using Cloudflare?
description:
During the recent partial outage of Cloudflare's network[1] multiple other top performing DNS providers[2] stopped working, because they were all using Cloudflare's DNS Firewall[3].

The affected services included:

– DigitalOcean DNS

– Linode DNS

– DNSimple DNS

It would be good to know any DNS providers with anti-DDoS protection that won't go down with Cloudflare's network.

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31820635

[2] https://www.dnsperf.com/

[3] https://www.cloudflare.com/dns/dns-firewall/
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有任何不使用Cloudflare的抗DDoS保护的DNS供应商吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有任何不使用Cloudflare的抗DDoS保護的DNS供應商嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
在最近Cloudflare网络[1]的部分中断期间，其他多个性能优异的DNS提供商[2]停止工作，因为他们都在使用Cloudflare的DNS防火墙[3]。

受影响的服务包括：

- DigitalOcean DNS

- Linode DNS

- DNSimple DNS

如果能知道任何具有抗DDoS保护的DNS提供商不会因为Cloudflare的网络而瘫痪，那就更好了。

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31820635

[2] https://www.dnsperf.com/

[3] https://www.cloudflare.com/dns/dns-firewall/
description_zh-Hant:
在最近Cloudflare網絡[1]的部分中斷期間，其他多個性能優異的DNS提供商[2]停止工作，因為他們都在使用Cloudflare的DNS防火牆[3]。

受影響的服務包括：

- DigitalOcean DNS

- Linode DNS

- DNSimple DNS

如果能知道任何具有抗DDoS保護的DNS提供商不會因為Cloudflare的網絡而癱瘓，那就更好了。

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31820635

[2] https://www.dnsperf.com/

[3] https://www.cloudflare.com/dns/dns-firewall/
